body.para: I'm writing a socks proxy that uses ssh tunnels for connections, I can get it working by making my connectClass listenTCP with a forwarding.SSHListenForwardingFactory and then ClientCreator a SOCKSv4Outgoing to connectTCP, but obviously that's a bad method.
How can I cut the listen/connect? Is there a way I can do it at that level or do I need to implement my own .connectSSH method?

It seems I need to get both sides placed in the reactor somehow, but SSHChannel.conn doesn't have a fileno() so addReader doesn't accept it. (Is addReader the right function? I found it in the curses example and am assuming it's just a generic file descriptor handler)
